summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Alley in Blocks Fourteen (14) and Seventeen (17), University Park Addition, being the alley between University Boulevard and Sixteenth Avenue Northeast, and East Forty-fifth Street and East Fiftieth Street; all in accordance with Resolution No. 5531 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
